snippet: Giants closer Brian Wilson, who is on the disabled list after having reconstructive surgery on his elbow, is doing whatever he can to help his teammates succeed.
abstract: San Francisco Giants closer Brian Wilson, sidelined by reconstructive elbow surgery, is relying on his quick wit instead of his fastball to motivate his teammates in the playoffs.
lead_paragraph: Giants closer Brian Wilson, who is on the disabled list after having reconstructive surgery on his elbow, is doing whatever he can to help his teammates succeed.

headline.seo: Wilson, Giants Closer, Leads Team Without Pitching
headline.main: Unable to Use His Arm, A Giant Uses His Words
headline.print_headline: Unable to Use His Arm, A Giant Uses His Words
